page.title: 17Media,Communications-Radio.
page.content: Metro radio is our local commercial radio station.Favourite shows on it depend on age eg.Night Owls has mostly adult listeners and Nicky Brown Show has mostly school children.The number of listeners goes up after 4pm as people arrive home from school and falls again about 7pm as families settle down to watch TV.The broadcasting area reaches from Peterlee in the south to Alnwick in the north,from Consett in the east to Whitley Bay in the west.The records they play are received,free, from artists and record shops.All shows are live except phone ins.These are not recorded,but have a 7 sec delay in a minute,so that if people swear or say anything not meant to be broadcast, they are cut off before they go on the air. There are adverts and jingles done as voice overs It began in Â£74
